resources.string: Use this to configure your battery to setup for learn mode. Writing each parameter writes to the corresponding register stored in the battery EEPROM chip.

Technical help is available at XDA via the link below.
 
 Need to add link.

This battery app interacts directly with the chip inside the DS2784 battery. Each parameter seen in this app is pulled from the corresponding register location inside the EEPROM memory. This app allows both read and write to any of these registers giving the user full control over their battery's parameters.
 
 In order for this app to function it must be used on a custom ROM with an edited ds2784_battery.c driver, which is most commonly available on Cyanogenmod 6.1 and pershoot's kernel for the Nexus One.
 The driver edits to the Nexus battery driver are available thanks to:.
 theloginwithnoname and RogerPodacter @ XDA
